parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: You can connect through SMS or QR-code, even email if you're connecting to a child. Go to: Settings -> My contacts -> Add contact
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: Supporters need to connect with a child to use the app. Why? Because Gimi is for the children!
parent_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: Gimi's mission is to give children financial superskills. In order to do that, children need to be involved and be allowed to practice.
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_question: Can I add another supporter to my child?
parent_faq_section_1_category_2_answer_1: Supporters can invite other supporters to their children. Just go to your child's settings, contacts and click invite.
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_1: You connect by inviting a supporter with an SMS, or scan a QR-code. Just go to: Settings -> My contacts -> Add contact
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_2: Children need to connect with a supporter to use the app. It could be parents, grand parents or other family members. It's the supporters who pay you!
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_question_3: How many supporters can I have?
kid_faq_section_1_category_1_answer_3: You can connect to multiple supporters! Invite the whole family!
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: Children can sign up with an email address or a phone number. They don't need their own phone, but they need to access the app on some device.
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_question: My child does not have an email address
parent_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_2: Children can sign up with an email address or a phone number. If they don't an email address, sign them up with yours!
parent_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: Gimi does not have an age limit. But we recommend it from ages 7 and older.
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: Gimi is not connected to any bank, so the money is never moved from supporters' accounts. Gimi is a way to keep track of how much supporters owe their children!
parent_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: Supporters can change the currency if they only have one child, and if that child does not have other connections. Go to: Settings -> User settings -> Currency
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: Payday is the day when the allowance is paid out! Money earned from chores, and savings interest is also added to savings, and a new countdown starts!
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: How do I change the day for Payday?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: Supporters can change Payday. Go to: Settings -> Children settings -> Payday, allowance and interest
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: Children learn better if their allowance is recurring and consistent. Separated parents are recommended to pay their half each week.
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_question: How much allowance should I give?
parent_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_4: You decide how much your child is ready to manage, but when you set up the allowance in the Gimi app, we'll give you a recommendation based on the child's age.
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_question_1: How do I get the money?
kid_faq_section_2_category_1_answer_1: Ask your supporters, they hold the money! They will then make a deduction from your savings if they give you money or pay for something.
kid_faq_section_2_category_2_answer_1: Payday is the day when the allowance is paid out! Money earned from chores, and savings interest is also added to savings, and a new countdown starts!
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_question: How do I change or delete a chore?
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores can not be changed - you can make a deduct from the child's savings
parent_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: The money you earn for doing chores are paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
parent_faq_section_4_category_2_question: How do I turn on/off notifications?
parent_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: Push notifications will remind you about important events. Just go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_1: How do I suggest a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_1: Children simply go to the "Earn" tab. Here, click a category under the "suggest chore" section. Then choose among the chores that we suggest or create your own!
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_question_2: How do I change or delete a chore?
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_2: Only supporters can delete or change a chore that has not already been approved. Approved chores can not be changed - you can make a deduct from the child's savings
kid_faq_section_3_category_1_answer_3: The money you earn for doing chores are paid out on Payday, together with your weekly or monthly allowance.
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_1: How do I start saving for a Dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_1: Go to: Dream -> Click Add. You can choose among the popular ones or create your own!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_2: Congratulations! You can ask your supporters to buy it for you, or just archive it and start saving for a new dream!
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_question_3: How do I delete, or create a new dream?
kid_faq_section_3_category_2_answer_3: Just click on your dream image! From here you can edit or delete your current dream.
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_question_1: How do I turn on/off notifications?
kid_faq_section_3_category_3_answer_1: Push notifications will remind you about important events. Just go to Settings -> User settings to switch them on/off
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app, for children who are ready to manage their own money. It comes with a prepaid Mastercard for spending, and an account for savings.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: The Gimi card is a Mastercard Prepaid card, issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: Why is the Gimi card better?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_3: The Gimi card is connected to the Gimi app. It not only enables children to pay, but also teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but parents have the option to block online spending. Parents also get full insight into spending behavior, and smart notifications about card activity.
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_question: Is my child ready for a card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_4: Parents decide when their children are ready for a card, there is no universal age. But we recommend it from 10 years and older. Still not sure? We have a card test for children, they will find it in "settings" in the app or on our website.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: Where can the Gimi card be used?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_1: The card can be used online, and in all stores. The card does not work in ATMs, and at some merchants that we blocked, as they are not appropriate to children.
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_2: Supporters top-up the card by adding their own card in the Gimi app. Go to: Settings -> Payment method and add a card!
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_question: Can the money be sent back?
parent_faq_section_5_category_2_answer_3: Gimi does not support refunds of money that's been transferred to the Gimi card or the Gimi account.
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_question: How much does the Gimi card cost?
parent_faq_section_5_category_3_answer_1: The card is included in the Gimi Master subscription. Supporters pay a subscription fee to upgrade to Gimi Master. The price varies depending on wheter you pay monthly, yearly or for a lifetime. And if there is an ongoing campaign, or if you have a promo code. To get an updated pricelist, go to subscriptions in Settings.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: How do I order a Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_1: Supporters must first buy a Gimi Master subscription, before ordering the card. Just go to Settings and Subscriptions, then upgrade to Master by purchasing a subscription in App Store or Play store.
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_question: Who can order a Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_4_answer_2: Only supporters can order the Gimi card, and it's only available in Sweden for now. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and an address in Sweden.
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_question: How do I activate the Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_1: Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Just go to the new card account and press "Activate"! But you might want to wait until the card arrives...
parent_faq_section_5_category_5_answer_2: The Gimi card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: How do I block the Gimi card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_1: Go to Settings -> Card settings -> Toggle off "Card is active"
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_2: If you think you lost it, lock the card. If you find it, you can just unlock it again! If you can't find it, keep it locked and contact us to get a replacement card!
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_3: Lock the card immediately! Go to: Settings -> Card settings -> Press the button "Card is active" and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to get a replacement.
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_question: How do I unblock a blocked card?
parent_faq_section_5_category_6_answer_4: If the card has been blocked by a supporter, then only he/she can unblock it. If the child blocked it, he/she can just unblock it same way!
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: Why do I need an app passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_1: Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_question: How do I change my passcode?
parent_faq_section_5_category_7_answer_2: Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_1: Go to: Settings -> Children settings -> General settings -> Master subscription, then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_2: If you end your Gimi Master subscripition, the card and the account will be closed. Gimi will go back to the free tracker version.
parent_faq_section_5_category_8_answer_3: If you have any funds left on the card or account after cancellation, please contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com so that we can transfer the money back to your bank account.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_1: Gimi Master is a paid subscription that upgrades the Gimi app, for children who are ready to manage their own money. It comes with a prepaid Mastercard for spending, and an account for savings.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_2: The Gimi card is a Mastercard Prepaid card, issued by Prepaid Financial Services Limited, pursuant to a license from Mastercard International Incorporated. Prepaid Financial Services Limited is regulated and authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority.
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_question_3: Why is the Gimi card better?
kid_faq_section_4_category_1_answer_3: The Gimi card is connected to the Gimi app. It not only enables children to pay, but also teaches them financial literacy. The card works online, but kids have the option to block online spending. kids also get full insight into spending behavior, and smart notifications about card activity.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_1: Where can I use the Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_1: The card can be used online, and in all stores. The card does not work in ATMs, and at some merchants that we blocked, as they are not appropriate to children.
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_question_2: How do I transfer money between the card and account?
kid_faq_section_4_category_2_answer_2: To transfer the money on your saving account, just go to: Card -> Top up card -> Enter the amount
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_question_2: Who can order a Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_4_answer_2: Only supporters can order the Gimi card, and it's only available in Sweden for now. You need a Swedish personal number, phone number and an address in Sweden.
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_question_1: How do I activate my Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_1: Children can activate the card as soon as it's issued. Just go to the new card account and press "Activate"! But you might want to wait until the card arrives...
kid_faq_section_4_category_5_answer_2: The Gimi card will arrive within 14 days from the date of order.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_1: How do I block the Gimi card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_1: Go to Settings -> Card settings -> Toggle off "Card is active"
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_2: If you think you lost it, lock the card. If you find it, you can just unlock it again! If you can't find it, keep it locked and contact us to get a replacement card!
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_3: Lock your card immediately! Go to: Settings -> Card settings -> Press the button "Card is active" and contact us at hello@gimitheapp.com to get a replacement.
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_question_4: How do I unblock a blocked card?
kid_faq_section_4_category_6_answer_4: If the card has been blocked by a supporter, then only he/she can unblock it. If you blocked it, just unblock it same way!
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_1: No worries, you can always see your card PIN in the app. Just go to: Settings -> Show PIN. Or find the Show PIN button on the card account.
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_question_2: I entered the wrong PIN code
kid_faq_section_4_category_7_answer_2: If you type the wrong PIN code 3 times, the card will be automatically blocked. You can unblock it in card settings!
kid_faq_section_4_category_8_answer_1: First check your balance to see if you have enough money on the card, and that the card is active. If this is not the reason, please contact us and we'll figure it out!
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_1: Why do I need an app passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_1: Using Gimi Master means managing real money in the app. We added a passcode for extra security to make sure your money is safe with Gimi.
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_question_2: How do I change my passcode?
kid_faq_section_4_category_9_answer_2: Go to: Settings -> App Settings and then follow the instructions.
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: How do I delete my user account?
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_question: I want to create a new user account
parent_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_question_1: How do I delete my user account?
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_1: Go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_question_2: I want to create a new user account
kid_faq_section_5_category_1_answer_2: To delete your current account, go to Settings -> User settings -> Delete user account. Then start over by creating a new account!
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: How is my personal data protected at Gimi?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_1: All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legeal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_question: How can I delete my personal data?
parent_faq_section_7_category_1_answer_2: If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Important! It's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_1: How is my personal data protected at Gimi?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_1: All user data is protected by extensive fire walls on encrypted servers. We are compliant with GDPR, The Swedish Data Protection Authority and PCI DSS. Gimi never shares or sells any user data with third parties, except when required for legeal reasons, such as with our card issuer and ID verification provider for card users.
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_question_2: How can I delete my personal data?
kid_faq_section_6_category_1_answer_2: If you delete your user account all of your personal data will be deleted. Important! It's not enough to uninstall the app, you need to delete the account from inside the app.
